entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 30. Wind chill near minus 43. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 28.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of light snow beginning late this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 28. Wind chill near minus 43. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 06 February 2023
